scripts.dev: concurrently --names "FRONT,SERVER" -c "cyan,green" "npm run dev --prefix client" "npm start --prefix server"
scripts.lint:client: echo "\n🔍 Linting CLIENT...\n" && npm run lint --prefix client
scripts.lint:server: echo "\n🔍 Linting SERVER...\n" && npm run lint --prefix server
scripts.lint:all:
echo "
🚀 Starting lint for entire project...
" && npm run lint:client && npm run lint:server && echo "
✅ All linting completed successfully!
"
